name: Bricks Breaker HD Free
description:
Bricks Breaker HD is amazing Bricks Breaker Game for every age group. This Game is Very addictive in nature. Dare to play this amazing game. You have to break the bricks. On each brick break you will get points.

Features:
-Game is Addictive in Nature.
-HD Quality of Graphics Used in the Game.
-More then 25 Levels in the Game.
-Player Interests increases after each level.
-You Can use Many Powers in the Game.
-Fully Tested on iPhone 3gs,4,4s,5,5s & iPad (All).
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.
